message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem of learning local metrics for nearest neighbor classification. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV) as nearest neighbor classification is a common technique used in computer vision. The paper also discusses the use of manifold regularization, which is a technique commonly used in natural language processing (cs.CL) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the scalability of the proposed method, which is a common concern in neural networks (cs.NE).
